name: Corazón de papel
description:
Corazón de papel is a videogame made for the Stay at Home GameJam, 2020. The year is 2023, and the economic situation is not the best. The game tells the story of Julián and his mom. She, currently struggling with a heart illness, tries to keep pace in life with a small work as a seamstress. Follow the story of one of the many families who are left out of the formal health and security system, and who are invisible for everyone.

A game by:

Art: Jessica Daniela Blanco Suárez

Code: Mateo Flórez Bacca
